title: League servers have gone down!?!
body: Was in the shop, it dc'd now i can't log into league nor contact the help page

replies.body: I'm just sitting here playing like nothing happened wut.

Doing this http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zgUdmTen-firewall-errorblack-screen-after-champion-select troubleshoot worked for me but I was after I tried it twice in a row :/
Good luck
ME NO CHANCE TO LOGIN TOO....{{champion:103}}
Same here! Hasn't been working for the last 5-10 minutes. :'-(
